description: Organic waste collection from Stony Mountain Institution
full_summary:
# Organic Waste Collection Tender Announcement
## Tender Details

* **Title (English)**: Organic Waste Collection
* **Title (French)**: Collecte des déchets organiques
* **Reference Number**: CB-182-64213329
* **Amendment Number**: 3
* **Solicitation Number**: 51000-24-4496985/A
* **Publication Date**: January 25, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 9, 2024, 3:00 PM CST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: April 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2029

## Tender Description

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) invites bidders for the Organic Waste Collection Tender. This contract is for the provision of organic waste collection services to divert compostable waste from the Stony Mountain Institution's Main Kitchen.

## Objectives

* Provide collection services to divert organic compostable waste from the Stony Mountain Institution's Main Kitchen for the duration of the contract and any periods of renewal.
* Supply all required types, sizes, and quantities of waste disposal containers on a rental basis.
* Identify and label all bins, containers, and bags with clear indicators of their intended waste stream.
* Remove and dispose of organic waste in accordance with the Environmental Management Act in the province of Manitoba and all applicable municipal, provincial, and federal bylaws and regulations.

## Performance Requirements

* The contractor must provide a monthly data report indicating the quantity and volume of organic compostable waste generated from the Stony Mountain Institution's main kitchen.
* The contractor must provide compostable bags for the organic waste.

## Trade Agreements

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

## Procurement Information

* Tender status: Exired
* Procurement category: Service
* Procurement method: Competitive, open bidding
* Selection criteria: Lowest price
* Regions of opportunity: Winnipeg
* Regions of delivery: Winnipeg
